statements: INSERT INTO BioinformaticsData (id, sequence, organism, gene_name) VALUES (1, 'ATGCATGC', 'Human', 'GeneA') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET sequence = excluded.sequence, organism = excluded.organism, gene_name = excluded.gene_name

INSERT INTO BioinformaticsData (id, sequence, organism, gene_name) VALUES (2, 'GCTAGCTA', 'Mouse', 'GeneB') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET sequence = excluded.sequence, organism = excluded.organism, gene_name = excluded.gene_name

INSERT INTO BioinformaticsData (id, sequence, organism, gene_name) VALUES (3, 'CTAGCTAG', 'Rat', 'GeneC') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET sequence = excluded.sequence, organism = excluded.organism, gene_name = excluded.gene_name
UPSERT INTO Genes (id, name, sequence) VALUES (1, 'Gene1', 'ATCG') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = 'Gene1', sequence = 'ATCG'
UPSERT INTO Proteins (id, gene_id, sequence) VALUES (1, 1, 'Protein1') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE gene_id = 1, sequence = 'Protein1'
UPSERT INTO Proteins (id, gene_id, sequence) VALUES (2, 2, 'Protein2') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE gene_id = 2, sequence = 'Protein2'
UPSERT INTO Gene (id, name, sequence) VALUES (1, 'Gene1', 'ATCG') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name='Gene1_updated', sequence='ATCG_updated';
UPSERT INTO Mutation (id, gene_id, type, position) VALUES (1, 1, 'SNP', 100) ON CONFLICT (id) DO NOTHING;
UPSERT INTO Variant (id, gene_id, mutation_id, name, effect) VALUES (1, 1, 1, 'Variant1', 'Effect1') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET effect='Effect1_updated';
INSERT INTO genes (gene_id, gene_name, organism, chromosome) VALUES (1, 'Gene1', 'Human', '1');
INSERT INTO transcripts (transcript_id, gene_id, transcript_name, sequence) VALUES (1, 1, 'Transcript1', 'ATCG');
INSERT INTO mutations (mutation_id, transcript_id, mutation_type, position, new_base) VALUES (1, 1, 'SNP', 10, 'A');

UPSERT INTO gene_info (gene_id, gene_name, chromosome, start_position, end_position) VALUES (1, 'Gene1', 'Chr1', 1000, 2000) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE gene_name='Gene1_updated', start_position=1001, end_position=2001;

UPSERT INTO protein_info (protein_id, protein_name, gene_id, length, sequence) VALUES (1, 'Protein1', 1, 300, 'AAGCTAGC') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE protein_name='Protein1_updated', length=301, sequence='AAGCTAGCAG';
UPSERT INTO mutation_info (mutation_id, gene_id, mutation_description) VALUES (1, 2, 'Mutation in gene2') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE mutation_description='Mutation in gene2_updated';
